      • Non-Burning World:
        • Experience Nodestone (x5): Untradeable, 7-day duration.
        • Arcane Symbol Selector Coupon (x150): Untradeable, 7-day duration.
      • Burning World:
        • Experience Nodestone (x10): Untradeable, 7-day duration.
        • Arcane Symbol Selector Coupon (x250): Untradeable, 7-day duration.
    • Lv. 260: Reach Lv. 260 on your Hyper Burning character to receive the following rewards:
      • Sacred Symbol Selector Coupon (x100): Untradeable, Permanent.
      • HYPER BURNING Medal:  Untradeable, 7-day duration. Grants STR/DEX/INT/LUK +6, Attack Power/Magic ATT +6.

    Item Burning

    • PST (UTC -8): Wednesday, November 20, 2024 (End of Maintenance) - Tuesday, February 11, 2025 3:59 PM
    • CET (UTC +1): Wednesday, November 20, 2024 (End of Maintenance) - Wednesday, February 12, 2025 12:59 AM
    • AEDT (UTC +11): Wednesday, November 20, 2024 (End of Maintenance) - Wednesday, February 12, 2025 10:59 AM

    Event Details:

    • Hyper Burning characters are about to get even more support to get caught up into the action with the all new Item Burning system!
    • Requirements: Lv. 200 newly created Hyper Burning character and have completed the ‘A Greater Power’ quest. (Newly created Hyper Burning Zero character that has completed Story Quest Act 2).
    • Click on the Event Notifier or talk to the Administrator NPC located at the Event Hall and click the ‘Participate’ button.
    • Starting with the new Hyperburning Aran or Shade from the Blooming Moon event? You can apply the Item Burning to these characters for an even smoother leveling experience!
    • After completing the ‘[Item Burning] Leveling Equipment - A necessity for Challengers’ quest you will receive 8 types of Challenger Equipment for your Job in your inventory.
    • Equipment consists of the following:
      • Challenger Weapon, Hat, Top, Bottom, Gloves, Shoes, Cape, and Shoulder Accessory.
        • Xenon characters receive a regular weapon instead of a Thief or Pirate exclusive weapon.
        • Zero characters receive 7 equipment pieces and do not receive a weapon.
        • Stats for each equipment are predetermined and are based on your character’s Job. Please note that restrictions apply for Scroll use, Star Force enhancement, Transfer Hammer, Bonus Stats resetting, and Potential resetting.
    • Challenger Equipment will be enhanced by completing the following missions:
    Stage Level Content Reward
    1 200 Defeat Zakum [Chaos] by yourself Challenger Equipment Perk 1
    2 210 Defeat Vellum [Chaos] by yourself Challenger Equipment Perk 2
    3 220 Defeat Papulatus [Chaos] by yourself Challenger Equipment Perk 3
    4 225 Defeat Lotus [Normal] by yourself Challenger Equipment Perk 4
    5 230 Defeat Guardian Angel Slime [Normal] by yourself Challenger Equipment Perk 5
      • Missions are completed if you defeat the boss on a higher difficulty by yourself.
    • A final Challenger’s Mission will be available when reaching Lv. 260, providing you with a special reward!
      • Challenger’s Mission: Defeat Lucid [Easy] by yourself.
        • Reward:
          • 100 Sol Erda Fragments, Untradable, Permanent.
          • Level 5 Sacred Symbol: Cernium, Untradable, Permanent.
    • You MUST clear the previous stage’s mission in order to be able to complete the next mission.
    • Item Burning event can only be completed PER ACCOUNT.
      • If you create a new character after deleting the character, you are unable to participate in the event again.
    • Equipment will be given after completion of the ‘[Item Burning] Leveling Equipment - A Necessity for Challengers’ quest, so make sure to complete the quest on the character you want the equipment on.
    • Characters who have completed the 6th Job Advancement are able to use the Sol Erda Fragments.
    • The Lv. 5 Sacred Symbol: Cernium can be claimed after completing the ‘A Divine Power’ quest.
    • If Open Advancement is performed, the relevant Job’s weapon will be distributed for replacement upon completion of the next mission after Open Advancement.
    • Fusion Anvil, Soul Collector, Soul, and Item Tag items are able to be used on Challenger equipment but will be reset when equipment growth is performed.

    Zero to One Hundred

    • PST (UTC -8): Wednesday, November 20, 2024 (End of Maintenance) - Tuesday, January 14, 2025 3:59 PM
    • CET (UTC +1): Wednesday, November 20, 2024 (End of Maintenance) - Wednesday, January 15, 2025 12:59 AM
    • AEDT (UTC +11): Wednesday, November 20, 2024 (End of Maintenance) - Wednesday, January 15, 2025 10:59 AM

    Event Details:

    • Boost to Lv. 100 with 7 characters in no time with the return of Zero to One Hundred!
    • Requirements: Characters between Lv. 10 - Lv. 100. Zero characters cannot participate in the event. Burning characters can also participate.
    • Accept the '[Zero to One Hundred] Accelerated Zero to One Hundred’ quest through the star event notifier on the left side of the screen or talk to Spiegelette located in Henesys, Nameless Town, and Cernium.
      • There will be a special Zero to One Hundred growth effect displayed on the character you designated in the character selection screen.
    • Characters designated for Zero to One Hundred can move to the hunting zone through the '[Zero to One Hundred] Move to the Leveling Acceleration Hunting Zone' quest in the star event notifier or by talking to Spiegelette.
    • In the hunting zone, you’ll defeat monsters that give accelerated EXP.
    • You can freely enter or exit the level acceleration hunting zone by talking to Spiegelette at any time during the event.
    • There will be different hunting zones depending on your level that you will automatically move to upon entering.
    • After reaching the level for the next hunting zone, you can move there by talking to Spiegelette within the current hunting zone.
    • After you reach Lv. 101, you will be automatically moved to the map you were in prior to entering the hunting zone.
    • Up to 7 characters per account can participate in the event.
      • The count is deducted after setting the character for Zero to One Hundred.
      • The count isn't restored even if the set character is deleted, and an additional selection can't be made that day.
      • You can only set one character a day.
    • Certain jobs must complete their early tutorials to move to the Zero to One Hundred level-accelerated hunting zone.
      • Cadena, Ark, and Illium cannot acquire EXP in level-accelerated hunting zones if they haven't completed their early tutorials.
    • Keep note that you cannot form parties with other characters within the hunting zone.
    • The Atmospheric Effect that is used in the hunting zone is applied.
    • EXP obtained from monsters in the hunting zone will have the EXP Boost buff effect applied.
    • Characters will have their own monsters summoned in the hunting zone and will not share monsters with other players.
    • You can still claim Level Achievement Rewards and special gifts even when reaching set levels outside the level-accelerated hunting zone.

    Level Achievement Rewards:

    • Reach Lv. 30: Lv. 30 Equipment Box: UnTradable, 30-day duration. Open to receive an unTradable weapon and armor set suitable for your class.
    • Reach Lv. 60: Lv. 60 Equipment Box: UnTradable, 30-day duration. Open to receive an unTradable weapon and armor set suitable for your class.
    • Reach Lv. 101: Legendary Cryptic Chest: UnTradable, 30-day duration. Item can be opened with a Lv. 100 and above character. Open to receive:
      • Frozen Hat: UnTradable, Permanent. Req. Lv: 100. STR/DEX/INT/LUK +23, MaxHP/MaxMP +270, Attack Power/Magic ATT +1, Defense +293. Upgrades available: 10.
      • Frozen Cape: UnTradable, Permanent. Req. Lv: 100. STR/DEX/INT/L
      • UK +7, Attack Power/Magic ATT +7, Defense +180, Speed +9, Jump +5. Upgrades available: 7.
      • Frozen Suit: UnTradable, Permanent. Req. Lv: 100. STR/DEX/INT/LUK +27, Attack Power/Magic ATT +1, Defense +315. Upgrades available: 10.
      • Frozen Weapon Box: UnTradable, 7-day duration. Open to receive:
        • Frozen Weapon: UnTradable, Permanent. Req. Lv: 100. Stats will vary based upon your job.
      • Frozen Secondary Weapon Box: UnTradable, 7-day duration. Open to receive:
        • Frozen Secondary Weapon: UnTradable, Permanent. Req. Lv: 100. Stats will vary based upon your job.

    Accelerated Zero to One Hundred Special Gift:

    • The special gift can be claimed from a world where the Zero to 100 level acceleration character didn't level up upon meeting the special gift claiming requirement.
    • Only obtainable once per account.
    • My Friend Orange Mushroom Hat: Untradable, Permanent.

    • Our Maple Tree Chair: Transferable within account, Permanent. Other players can sit on the chair with you!

    Tera Blink

    • PST (UTC -8): Wednesday, November 20, 2024 (End of Maintenance) - Tuesday, February 11, 2025 3:59 PM
    • CET (UTC +1): Wednesday, November 20, 2024 (End of Maintenance) - Wednesday, February 12, 2025 12:59 AM
    • AEDT (UTC +11): Wednesday, November 20, 2024 (End of Maintenance) - Wednesday, February 12, 2025 10:59 AM

    Event Details:

    • Spiegelmann is helping you level faster than ever before with his special event!
    • Requirements: Characters above Lv. 10 that have been registered as Hyper Burning characters. (Zero characters who have been registered as Hyper Burning characters must have completed Story Quest Act 2.)
    • Accept the ‘[Tera Blink] World Inside the Hat’ quest from the star event notifier on the left side of the screen or talk to NPC Spiegelmann located in Henesys or Nameless Town.
    • After completing the ‘[Tera Blink] World Inside the Hat’ quest, speak to NPC Spiegelmann to move to the map.
      • You can stay up to 40 minutes at one time in the event map.
      • You can freely enter and exit the event map by talking to NPC Spiegelmann.
      • All skill and buff effects given through the mission are collected and removed when you exit the event map.

    Quests and Rewards:

    • Completing Spiegelmann's Missions
      • Spiegelmann's Power Elixir: UnTradable, Permanent.
      • Spiegelmann's Dazzling Hat Effect: UnTradable, Permanent.
      • Dazzling Hat (Pet): UnTradable, Permanent. Dazzling Hat has a 90-day magic duration and can be revived using the Water of Life item.
      • Dazzling Hat's Aura: UnTradable, Permanent.
      • Spiegelmann's Hat Chair: Transferable within account, Permanent.

    Note: you can do the ‘[Tera Blink] World Inside the Hat’ quest again even if you delete and recreate a Hyper Burning or Blossoming by Moonshade: Hyper Burning character. However, Spiegelmann's Hat Chair and Spiegelmann's Dazzling Hat effect will not be awarded again.

    Burning World

    • Wednesday, November 20, 2024 (End of Maintenance) - Wednesday, Feburary 12, 2025 (Start of Maintenance)

    Burning World is a special world with special rules that will exist only for the duration of the Burning World event, filled with boosts to make it easier than ever to level up fast. While on Burning World, all characters will gain the special Burning skill, which grants the following bonuses:

    • 1.5x EXP
    • Weapon ATT/Magic ATT +50
    • Damage against Normal Monsters +30%
    • Damage against Bosses +30%
    • Critical Rate +30%
    • Critical Damage +30%
    • Knockback Resistance +100%
    • STR/DEX/INT/LUK +50
    • MaxHP/MaxMP +2,500

    You will also be able to create three Mega Burning characters, who operate in the same manner as in previous Mega Burning events: After reaching Lv. 10, every time that character levels up, they will also gain two bonus levels, all the way up to Lv. 150. Combined with the Burning EXP bonus and boosted damage, you'll be able to power your way through those levels faster than ever before!

    Additionally, even after your Mega Burning characters have been created, you'll be able to create another two characters to level up and leap, which will still benefit from the Burning skill! Please note that, the default number of Character Slots on Burning World is six, and Character Slot Expansion Coupons cannot be used in Burning World. You can move up to 5 characters that meet the requirements. Additionally, Zero characters cannot be selected as a "Burning" character on character creation, but can be selected as your Hyper Burning character upon reaching Lv. 200 and completing Story Act Quest 2.

    As Burning World is a temporary world to be removed at the end of the World Leap stage, some MapleStory features will be unavailable there:

    • The Meso Market will not be available.
    • Link Skills cannot be transferred between characters on Burning World (the Burning skill will have to be enough!).
    • Maple Legion will be unavailable; the UI will be unavailable and you will be unable to progress on it past talking to Legion NPCs.
    • Monster Collection will be unavailable, monsters will not be added to the collection and the UI will not open.
    • Maple Tour will not be available.
    • The following quests connected to the above features cannot be completed:
      • Teaching Link Skill
      • Teaching Zero's Link Skill
      • [Legion] Whip the Whelps
      • [Legion] Defeat the Golden Wyvern
      • [Legion] We Are Legion
      • Talk to Dame Appropriation
      • [Legion] Legion Introduction
      • [Monster Collection] Monster Collector
    • The following Cash Shop items cannot be purchased on Burning World:
      • Character Slot Coupon
      • Add 4 Slots (Storage)
      • Add 8 Slots (Storage)
      • House Wedding Ticket
      • Commitment of Love Ticket
      • Promise Ring
      • Cupid Ring
      • Cloud Promise Ring
      • Venus Fireworks
      • Crossed Hearts
      • Illumination Couples Ring
      • Friendship Ring: Clover
      • Friendship Ring: Flower Petal
      • Friendship Ring: Star
      • Snow Dome Friendship Ring

    Burning World Rewards

    Upon creating a Mega Burning character in Burning World (rewards can be received up to 3 times per world):

    • Flameborn Medal: Untradeable, does not expire. Grants STR/DEX/INT/LUK +5, Weapon ATT/Magic ATT +1, MaxHP/MaxMP +250.
    • Pearl Maple Armor Box: Untradeable, box expires after 7 days. Open to receive:
      • Pearl Maple Hat: Can be traded once within the same account. Req. Lv: 30. STR/DEX/INT/LUK +6, Weapon ATT/Magic ATT +1, Defense +100. Upgrades available: 7. Part of the Maple White Set.
      • Pearl Maple Suit: Can be traded once within the same account. Req. Lv: 30. STR/DEX/INT/LUK +7, Weapon ATT/Magic ATT +1, Defense +155. Upgrades available: 10. Part of the Maple White Set.
      • Pearl Maple Cape: Can be traded once within the same account. Req. Lv: 30. STR/DEX/INT/LUK +2, MaxHP/MaxMP +50, Weapon ATT/Magic ATT +1, Defense +40. Upgrades available: 5. Part of the Maple White Set.
      • Pearl Maple Gum: Can be traded once within the same account. Req. Lv: 30. STR/DEX/INT/LUK +5, Defense +10. Upgrades available: 5. Part of the Maple White Set.
      • Pearl Maple Pendant: Can be traded once within the same account. Req. Lv: 30. STR/DEX/INT/LUK +8, Defense +100. Upgrades available: 5. Part of the Maple White Set.
      • Pearl Maple Buckle: Untradeable. Req. Lv: 30. STR/DEX/INT/LUK +3, Weapon ATT/Magic ATT +1, Defense +20. Upgrades available: 3. Part of the Maple White Set.
    • Slot Expansion: Equip, Use, Set-Up and Etc inventories expanded to 64 slots. Granted via a quest available on logging in with a Burning character.
    • Hyper Teleport Rock: Untradeable. 30-day duration. Can be used repeatedly until it expires.
    • Power Elixir (x1,000): Untradeable, permanent duration.
    • Spell Trace (x1,500): Can be traded, permanent duration.

    Additional Mega Burning Rewards:

    • Lv. 10: Mysterious Cryptic Chest: Untradeable, 7-day duration. Open to receive:
      • Snail Pet: 30-day duration.
    • Lv. 100: Legendary Cryptic Chest: Untradeable, box expires on February 11 at 11:59 PM UTC. Can be opened at Lv. 100. Open to receive:
      • Frozen Hat: Untradeable. Req. Lv: 100. STR/DEX/INT/LUK +23, MaxHP/MaxMP +270, Weapon ATT/Magic ATT +1, Defense +293. Upgrades available: 10.
      • Frozen Cape: Untradeable. Req. Lv: 100. STR/DEX/INT/LUK +7, Weapon ATT/Magic ATT +7, Defense +180, Speed +9, Jump +5. Upgrades available: 7.
      • Frozen Suit: Untradeable. Req. Lv: 100. STR/DEX/INT/LUK +27, Weapon ATT/Magic ATT +1, Defense +315. Upgrades available: 10.
      • Frozen Weapon Box: Untradeable, 7-day duration. Open to receive:
        • Frozen Weapon: Untradeable. Req. Lv: 100. Stats will vary based upon your job.
      • Frozen Secondary Weapon Box: Untradeable, 7-day duration. Open to receive:
        • Frozen Secondary Weapon: Untradeable. Req. Lv: 100. Stats will vary based upon your job.
    • Lv. 130: Keep On Burning Title Coupon: Title. Untradeable, coupon expires on February 11 at 11:59 PM UTC, stat duration lasts for 14 days. Can be used at Lv. 130. Grants durational stats STR/DEX/INT/LUK +10, Weapon ATT/Magic ATT +10, Boss Damage +10%, Ignore Defense +10%, MaxHP/MaxMP +400.

    Burning World Leap

    • PST (UTC -8): Wednesday, February 12, 2025 (End of Maintenance) - Tuesday, February 25, 2025 3:59 PM
    • CET (UTC +1): Wednesday, February 12, 2025 (End of Maintenance) - Wednesday, February 26, 2025 12:59 AM
    • AEDT (UTC +11): Wednesday, February 12, 2025 (End of Maintenance) - Wednesday, February 26, 2025 10:59 AM

    As the saying goes, the light that burns twice as bright burns half as long, and the Burning World will burn very brightly indeed. However, while this new world will be consumed at the end of it all, a new life awaits your characters in the other worlds of MapleStory!

    Lv. 150+ characters in Burning World will be allowed to leap to another world of your choosing during the World Leap period, taking their equipped items, inventory, and mesos with them to join their new communities. When this period begins, all Burning World characters will be moved to the Burning Leap Zone map, where they will be able to speak to the NPC Mover to complete their exodus.

    • Characters in Burning World must be at least Lv. 150 in order to World Leap, whether they were Mega Burning characters or not.
      • Zero characters must be both Lv. 150+ and having completed Story Quest Act 2.
      • It will not be possible to leave the Burning Leap Zone map during this period, making it impossible to gain any more EXP. Make sure you're Lv. 150 before February 26!
    • You do not need an empty character slot on the destination world for your new character (you will be granted a free Character Slot if you are at your unlocked limit on that world), however if you have reached the maximum character limit on that world, you will need to delete a character in order to make room for them.
    • Characters can be transferred to Interactive Worlds only.
    • Characters in Guilds will not be able to World Leap until they have either left or disbanded their Guild.
    • Your character's equipped items, inventory, and mesos will be transferred with your character, but items within your Storage, Cash Shop Inventory, mail, and auction house will not be. Make sure you clear everything out before taking the big leap!
    • You may send your Burning World characters all to the same world, or to different worlds.
    • Medals obtained from regularly-resetting rankings will not be transferred, and your rankings in those pieces of content will also not be transferred.

    Aran and Shade Redux Events!


    Two of Maple World's legendary heroes have turned over a new leaf, with a revamped set of skills and abilities coming to the polearm-wielding Aran and spirit-brawler Shade!

    Head to their Classes and Jobs pages to take a look at some of Aran's new abilities that get the most out of her polearm, or the Forgotten Hero Shade's new powers calling upon his connection to the spirits. And when you're ready, get a bonus Hyper Burning Shade or Aran with the Blossoming by Moonshade events below!

    Blossoming by Moonshade Hyper Burning

    Event Duration:

    • PST (UTC -8): Wednesday, November 20, 2024 (End of Maintenance) - Tuesday, February 11, 2025 3:59 PM
    • CET (UTC +1): Wednesday, November 20, 2024 (End of Maintenance) - Wednesday, February 12, 2025 12:59 AM
    • AEDT (UTC +11): Wednesday, November 20, 2024 (End of Maintenance) - Wednesday, February 12, 2025 10:59 AM

    Event Details:

    • Create a new Aran or Shade character and designate it as a ‘Blossoming by Moonshade: Hyper Burning’ character.
      • If you do not have a character designated as a Hyper Burning yet, when creating an Aran or Shade, the Blossoming by Moonshade Hyper Burning will be applied first.
    • Existing Lv. 200 - 258 Aran/Shade characters can be set as Blossoming by Moonshade Hyper Burning by pressing the ‘Set as Hyper Burning’ button the the right side of the character selection window.

    • Blossoming by Moonshade Hyper Burning characters can earn two additional levels each time you gain a level up from Lv. 11 to Lv. 260!
      • Blossoming by Moonshade Hyper Burning characters can only use Typhoon Growth Potions, Magnificent Growth Potions, and Transcendent Growth Potions.
    • Blossoming by Moonshade Hyper Burning characters can unlock and claim rewards through the ‘Blossoming by Moonshade: Hyper Burning’ button in the star event notifier on the left side of the screen.
      • Characters leveling in Burning World can receive even more powerful Burning World rewards.
      • Level achievement rewards can be claimed once per account. You cannot claim it again even if you delete the character after claiming and create a new one.
      • Only characters who completed the 5th Job Advancement and the ‘A Greater Power’ quest can claim the Eternal Flame Title Coupon, Nodestone, and Infinite Flame Title Coupon rewards.
      • For an existing character that already has the Eternal Flame Ring, another of the same item cannot be obtained from the Eternal Flame Ring Coupon.
      • You cannot receive the Burning world reward and Interactive world reward under the same achievement conditions at the same time.
      • You can only obtain the symbol of the region you've completed the Arcane River and Grandis story quests, when you use the Arcane/Sacred Symbol Selector Coupon.
      • Each region's Arcane Symbol reward can be claimed after completing the relevant region's Arcane Symbol quest.
      • If the Arcane Symbol was transferred by using Arcane Catalyst, the Unstable Arcane Symbol must be normalized first and then claim the level achievement reward (Lv. 5/Lv. 8 Arcane Symbol) to enhance it properly.
    • For existing characters designated as Hyper Burning, only level achievement rewards will be available.

     

    Blossoming by Moonshade: Flower Scroll - Aran

    Event Duration:

    • PST (UTC -8): Wednesday, November 20, 2024 (End of Maintenance) - Tuesday, February 11, 2025 3:59 PM
    • CET (UTC +1): Wednesday, November 20, 2024 (End of Maintenance) - Wednesday, February 12, 2025 12:59 AM
    • AEDT (UTC +11): Wednesday, November 20, 2024 (End of Maintenance) - Wednesday, February 12, 2025 10:59 AM

    Event Details:

    • We prepared gifts for both new and existing Aran characters!
    • Accept the ‘[Blossoming by Moonshade Scroll] Leveling Gifts’ by talking to Cassandra or click on the ‘[Blossoming by Moonshade Scroll] Leveling Gifts’ button and click on the ‘Participate’ button within the star event notifier on the left side of the screen.’
      • You can check the progress of the event by clicking the ‘Blossoming by Moonshade: Moon Scroll” button on the event list.

    Gifts for New Aran Characters

    • Receive rewards that support your Aran’s growth when you reach certain levels.
      • Rewards can be claimed once per account.

    Rewards for New Aran Characters

    • Lv. 30 Reached:
      • Lv. 30 Equipment Box: Untradable, 7-day duration. The following item can be obtained from the Lv. 30 equipment box
        • Mithril Polearm: Untradable, Permanent.
      • Selective 8-slot Coupon (x4): Untradable, 7-day duration.
    • Lv. 100 Reached:
      • Through Trial Flowers Bloom Title Coupon (x1): Untradable, 7-day duration. Use to receive:
        • Through Trial Flowers Boom Title: Untradable, Permanent. Grants the following 30-day durational stats: All Stats +15, Max HP & MP + 750, Attack Power & Magic ATT +15, Boss Damage +10%, Ignore Defense +10%, 10% additional EXP, Arcane Power +30, Star Force +30.
      • Legendary Cryptic Chest (x1): Untradable, 7-day duration. Open to receive:
        • Frozen Hat: Untradable, Permanent.
        • Frozen Outfit: Untradable, Permanent.
        • Frozen Cape: Untradable, Permanent.
      • Frozen Weapon Box (x1): Untradable, 7-day duration. Open to receive:
        • Frozen Weapon (Frozen Polearm): Untradable, Permanent.
      • Frozen Secondary Weapon Box (x1): Untradable, 7-day duration. Open to receive:
        • Frozen Weapon (Onyx Maple Dragon Mass): Untradable, Permanent.
    • Lv. 150 Reached:
      • Trait Boost Potion (x1): Untradable, 7-day duration.
      • 15-star Root Abyss Set Box (Time-Restricted) (x1): Untradable, 7-day duration. Open to receive:
        • 15-star Epic Root Abyss Hat: Untradable, 90-day duration.
        • 15-star Epic Root Abyss Top: Untradable, 90-day duration.
        • 15-star Epic Root Abyss Bottom: Untradable, 90-day duration.
      • 15-star Fafnir Weapon Box: Untradable, 7-day duration. Open to receive:
        • 15-star Fafnir Weapon (Fafnir Moon Glaive): Untradable, 90-day duration.
      • 3x EXP Coupon (30 min) (x2): Untradable, 7-day duration.
    • Lv. 200 Reached:
      • Arcane Symbol Selector Coupon (x100): Untradable, 7-day duration.
      • Nodestone (x100): Untradable, 7-day duration.
      • 3x EXP Coupon (30 min) (x2): Untradable, 7-day duration.
      • Spiegelette’s Golden Strawberry Farm One-Time Entry Pass (x1): Untradable, 7-day duration.
    • Lv. 205 Reached:
      • Arcane Symbol Selector Coupon (x100): Untradable, 7-day duration.
      • 3x EXP Coupon (30 min) (x2): Untradable, 7-day duration.
    • Lv. 210 Reached:
      • Arcane Symbol Selector Coupon (x100): Untradable, 7-day duration.
      • Nodestone (x100): Untradable, 7-day duration.
      • 3x EXP Coupon (30 min) (x2): Untradable, 7-day duration.
      • Spiegelette’s Golden Strawberry Farm One-Time Entry Pass (x2): Untradable, 7-day duration.
      • 1-of-3 Event Ring Selector Coupon (x1): Untradable, 7-day duration. Use to choose one of the following:
        • Tenebris Expedition Ring: Untradable, Permanent.
        • Glory Guard Ring: Justicar: Untradable, Permanent.
        • Awake Ring: Untradable, Permanent.
      • Event Ring Exclusive Solid Cube (x50): Untradable, 7-day duration.
      • (Interactive Worlds Only) Tenebris Expedition Ring Enhancement Scroll (x3): Untradable, 7-day duration.
    • Lv. 215 Reached:
      • Arcane Symbol Selector Coupon (x100): Untradable, 7-day duration.
      • Experience Nodestone (x5): Untradable, 7-day duration.
      • 3x EXP Coupon (30 min) (x2): Untradable, 7-day duration.
      • Spiegelette’s Golden Strawberry Farm One-Time Entry Pass (x2): Untradable, 7-day duration.
      • Unique Emblem Box (x1): Untradable, 7-day duration. Open to receive:
        • Gold Heroes Emblem (Aran): Untradable, Permanent.
    • Lv. 220 Reached:
      • Arcane Symbol Selector Coupon (x200): Untradable, 7-day duration.
      • 3x EXP Coupon (30 min) (x2): Untradable, 7-day duration.
      • Absolab Weapon/Dominator Pendant Selection Box (x1): Untradable, 7-day duration. Open to choose one of the following:
        • 17-Star Unique Absolab Weapon (AbsoLab Hellslayer): Untradable, Permanent.
        • 15-Star Unique Dominator Pendant: Untradable, Permanent.
    • Lv. 230 Reached:
      • Blossoming by Moonshade Title Coupon (x1): Transferable within world, 7-day duration. Use to receive:
        • ‘Blossoming by Moonshade Title: Untradable, Permanent. Grants the following permanent stats: All Stats +20, Max HP & MP + 1000, Attack Power & Magic ATT +10, Boss Damage +10%.
      • Note: The Blossoming by Moonshade Title Coupon can only be claimed once per account.

    Gifts for All Aran Characters

    • Defeat 1,000 enemies within your level range (20 levels below and 20 levels above) and click the ‘Check In’ button to receive the event reward.
      • You can check in daily once per account.
      • Reward details are shared among all characters within the world.
      • Check-ins are not shared between Aran and Shade jobs.
      • Titles awarded from Gifts for All Aran Characters do not include stats.

    Check-In Rewards for All Aran Characters:

    • Day 1:
      • Lil Maha Pet Package (x1): Tradable within world, 7-day duration. Open to receive:
        • Lil Maha: Untradable. Can be used for 90 days, and their duration can be renewed using a Water of Life item.
        • Lil Maha’s Polearm: Untradable, Permanent.
    • Day 2:
      • Through Trial Flowers Bloom Title Coupon (x1): Untradable, 7-day duration. Use to receive:
        • Through Trial Flowers Boom Title: Untradable, Permanent.
    • Day 3:
      • New Aran Hero Feather Coupon (x1): Tradable within world, 7-day duration. Use to receive:
        • New Aran Hero Feather: Untradable, Permanent.
    • Day 4:
      • Permanent Ice Blossom Mount Coupon (x1): Tradable within world, 7-day duration. Use to receive:
        • Permanent Ice Blossom Mount: Untradable, Permanent.
    • Day 5:
      • Lilin’s Cozy Home Chair: Tradable within world, 7-day duration.
    • Day 6:
      • Aran Damage Skin (Unit) Coupon: Tradable within world, 7-day duration. Use to receive:
        • Aran Damage Skin (Unit): Untradable, Permanent.
    • Day 7:
      • Aran Label/Chat Ring Coupon (x1): Tradable within world, 7-day duration. Use to receive:
        • Aran Label Ring: Untradable, Permanent.
        • Aran Chat Ring: Untradable, Permanent
    • Day 8:
      • Aran Emblem Coupon (x1): Tradable within world, 7-day duration. Use to receive:
        • Aran Emblem: Untradable, Permanent.
    • Day 9:
      • Nostalgic Aran Set Coupon (x1): Tradable within world, 7-day duration. Use to receive:
        • Meteoric Glacier Splitter: Untradable, Permanent.
        • Heroic Earrings: Untradable, Permanent.
        • Aran Helmet: Untradable, Permanent.
        • Aran Armor (M) or Aran Armor (F): Untradable, Permanent.
    • Day 10:
      • Rien Background Coupon (x1): Tradable within world, 7-day duration. Use to receive:
        • Rein Background: Shared within account, Permanent.

    Event Duration:

      • Rewards can be claimed once per account.

    • Defeat 1,000 enemies within your level range (20 levels below and 20 levels above) and click the ‘Check In’ button to receive the event reward.
      • You can check in daily once per account.
      • Reward details are shared among all characters within the world.
      • Check-ins are not shared between Aran and Shade jobs.

        • Cloud-Cloaked Moon Title: Untradable, Permanent.

      • Shade Damage Skin (Unit) Coupon: Tradable within world, 7-day duration. Use to receive:
        • Shade Damage Skin (Unit): Untradable, Permanent.

        • Shade Label Ring: Untradable, Permanent.

    [Updated 11/20/2024] v.255 - The Dark Ride: Ride or Die Patch Notes


    Get ready to Ride or Die in a brand-new Global MapleStory-exclusive experience where you'll test your skills and face off against familiar foes! Go Zero to One Hundred with revamped abilities for Aran and Shade in their epic redux. Level up your Legion with not one, but TWO Hyper Burning characters and Tera Blink your way to 10K! Journey through the Page of Memories to uncover stories from the past and earn awesome rewards.

    TABLE OF CONTENTS

    • New Updates
      • Aran Redux
      • Shade Redux
      • Skill Improvements and Bug Fixes
      • Level-up Flow Changes
      • Intense Power Crystal Revamp
      • Familiars: Hotel Arcus
      • Boss/Monster Changes and Bug Fixes
      • Monster Park Changes
      • NPC Changes and Bug Fixes
      • UI Changes and Bug Fixes
      • Maple Planner
      • V Matrix Improvements

      • Damage Skin UI Changes
      • Item Changes and Bug Fixes

      • Exceptional Enhancement Changes
      • Epic Dungeon Changes and Bug Fixes
      • Fog Forest Training Grounds Changes
      • Collector’s Request
    • The Dark Ride: Ride or Die Event
      • The Dark Ride: Ride or Die
    • Page of Memories Events
      • Page of Memories
      • Book of Unforgettable Festivals
      • Book of Forgotten Festivals

      • Spell Trace Fever Time

    NEW UPDATES

    Aran Redux

    Aran's unlocked memories have uncovered a fantastical new set of techniques for her polearm to smash through her foes, along with a brand new story for the ancient, mighty warrior!

    Beginner Skill Changes

    • Regained Memory
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The movement speed boost has been removed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Combat Step
      • The skill effect has been changed.
      • The movement speed boost has been increased from 15 to 25.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Return to Rein
      • The skill effect has been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Combo Kill Blessing
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Three Snails
      • Fixed the issue where the skill could not be used.

    1st Job Skill Changes

    • NEW Final Charge
      • A new skill that quickly moves your character forward while pushing nearby enemies in front of you.
      • You can use the skill by canceling it immediately while using Beyond Blade. In this case a 3-second cooldown is applied.
    • NEW Final Toss
      • A new skill that jumps by launching multiple enemies into the air.
    • NEW Ol’ Reliable
      • A new skill that builds up the foundation of a warrior and increases DEF, ATT, and Critical Rate by building up the foundation.
    • Smash Swing
      • The skill effect has been changed.
      • The master level has been increased from 10 to 15.
      • Smash Swing can now be used while in the air.
    • The following skills have been removed:
      • Smash Wave
      • Body Pressure

    2nd Job Skill Changes

    • NEW Combo Ability
      • A new skill that increases combos every 5 seconds. The number of combos acquired every 5 seconds increases from 10 to 20.
      • Based on the number of stacked Combo Count, it increases attack and movement speed.
      • Permanently increases Critical Rate and Stance.
    • NEW Beyond Blade
      • A new skill where Maha draws out the power of Aran and sweeps away enemies in front of you.
    • Drain
      • The skill effect has been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Snow Charge
      • The damage boost at master level has been increased from 10% to 15%
      • The skill effect has been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Polearm Mastery
      • The Final Damage has been increased from 8% to 10%.
    • Final Attack
      • The skill effect has been changed.
    • The following skills have been removed:
      • Rolling Spin
      • Command Master I
      • Swing Studies I

    3rd Job Skill Changes

    • NEW Permafrost
      • With Maha’s power, summon a polearm containing icy energy to create a frozen ground for a certain period of time.
    • NEW Beyond Blade Mastery I
      • Further enhance Beyond Blade by drawing out Aran’s power with Maha.
    • NEW High Defense
      • Decrease damage taken and increase max HP, DEF, and Knockback Resistance.
    • Advanced Combo Ability
      • This skill applies the Combo Ability’s stack effect at the maximum value.
      • Decreased master level to 1 and the skill is automatically learned upon completing the 3rd Job Advancement.
      • The Critical Rate increase has been removed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Judgement Draw
      • The damage at master level has decreased from 380% to 200%.
      • The Command Activation effect and Damage over Time effect has been removed.
      • The up and down arrow keys + Attack Key command has been removed.
      • The skill effect has been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Adrenaline Rush
      • A freezing shockwave that continuously attacks nearby enemies while the skill is active.
      • The feature that increases Aran’s attacking skill damage, other than Finisher, summons, additional attack skills, attack count, and max amount of enemies that can be hit during Adrenaline Rush has been removed.
      • The skill effect has been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Adrenaline Rush Activate
      • The master level has been increased from 1 to 20 and the level skill is shared with Adrenaline Rush.
      • The duration for activating Adrenaline Rush has been removed.
      • When the duration of Adrenaline Rush ends, combos will reset to 0.
      • Added a feature that refunds combos based on the number of direct attack skill hits made while Adrenaline Rush is active, triggered when Adrenaline Rush ends.
      • The number of combos refunded after Adrenaline Rush at master level has been increased from 200 to 500.
      • A cooldown period has been added.
      • The skill effect has been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Might
      • The master level has been increased from 10 to 20.
      • Added a feature that increases Critical Rate and Boss Damage.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Maha’s Blessing
      • The skill effect has been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • The following skills have been removed:
      • Aero Swing
      • Final Blow
      • Gathering Hook

    4th Job Skill Changes

    • NEW Adrenaline Overload
      • Use the power of combos and Maha’s power to go beyond the limits of Adrenaline Rush.
      • The number of attacks required to enter the Adrenal Awakening state during Adrenaline Rush has been decreased from 15 to 10.
    • NEW Glacial Prison
      • Bind enemies by unleashing a great amount of cold energy that was concentrated onto a polearm.
    • NEW Beyond Blade Mastery II
      • Draw out more of Aran’s power with a more powerful resonation with Maha.
    • NEW Cleaving Attack
      • Increases Ignore Defense and damage with endless effort.
      • The Damage boost at master level has been increased from 30% to 35%.
    • Finisher - Hunter’s Prey
      • Removed the feature that increased damage while charging.
      • Removed the feature that triggered a charge toward the enemy upon casting.
      • Removed the feature that allowed control of the attack angle when using the up and down arrow keys.
      • Added a cooldown of 30 seconds.
      • The number of attacks has been increased from 7 to 15.
      • The damage at master level has been decreased from 1070% to 790%.
      • The max enemies hit at master level has been increased from 1 to 10.
      • The skill effect has been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • High Mastery
      • The Critical Damage boost at master level has been increased from 8% to 10%
      • The Final Damage boost at master level has been increased from 15% to 21%.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Sudden Strike
      • The master level has been decreased from 30 to 10.
      • The damage for Final Charge, Final Toss, and Judgement Draw at master level has been increased from 60% to 140%.
      • The damage for Smash Swing and Permafrost has been increased when Sudden Strike is used.
    • Advanced Final Attack
      • The damage at master level has been increased from 85% to 180%.
    • Finisher - Storm of Fear
      • The skill has been removed.

    Hyper Skill Changes

    • NEW Permafrost - Reinforce
      • Increases damage of Permafrost.
    • NEW Permafrost - Spread
      • Increases Max Enemies Hit of Permafrost.
    • NEW Permafrost - Persist
      • Increases the duration of Permafrost.
    • NEW Hyper Finisher - Last Stand
      • Unleashes a slash containing Maha’s power with a hero’s indomitable will.
    • NEW Finisher - Reinforce
      • Increases the damage of Finisher and Hyper Finisher.
    • NEW Finisher - Guardbreak
      • Increases the Ignore Enemy DEF stat for Finisher and Hyper Finisher.
    • NEW Maha’s Blessing
      • Negates an enemy’s attack using a powerful barrier, created by the Spirit of Polearm Maha.
    • Surging Adrenaline
      • The skill icon has been changed.
    • Beyond-er Blade
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Beyond Blade Barrage
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Piercing Beyond Blade
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Heroic Memories
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • The following skills have been removed:
      • Heavy Swing
      • Swing - Boss Rush
      • Rebounding Swing
      • Storming Terror
      • Merciless Hunt
      • Adrenaline Burst
      • Maha’s Domain

    5th Job Skill Changes

    • NEW Final Beyond Blade - White Tiger
      • Complete the Beyond Blade by placing all of Maha’s power onto the Polearm.
    • NEW Finisher - Adrenaline Surge
      • Release an explosive burst of cold energy with Maha’s power creating a giant blizzard that attacks enemies.
    • Maha’s Carnage
      • The damage at Lv. 25 has been decreased from 1200% to 1100%.
      • The attack count has been decreased from 15 to 12.
      • The Slash count has been increased from 2 to 4.
      • When Adrenaline Rush or Adrenal Awakening is active, cooldown reduction will take into effect for Maha’s Carnage.
      • The skill effect has been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Blizzard Tempest
      • Stunning enemies while casting has been removed.
      • The number of enemies affected by Dire Wolf’s Curse has been decreased from 12 to 10 when casting.
      • The number of enemies affected by Dire Wolf’s Curse from the aura at set intervals has been decreased from 10 to 5.
      • The duration of Dire Wolf’s Curse has been increased from 10 to 15 seconds.
      • The maximum duration of Dire Wolf’s Curse has been increased from 20 to 30 seconds.
      • A feature has been added to Dire Wolf’s Curse that targets enemies with the highest HP
      • The damage for Dire Wolf’s Curse Ice Chunk at Lv. 25 has been increased from 950% to 1200%.
      • A cooldown of 0.4 seconds has been added to Ice Chunk.
      • Added a feature that increases the combo count when casting.
      • The cooldown has been decreased from 180 seconds to 90 seconds.
      • The casting skill effect has been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Maha’s Fury
      • The skill has been removed.

    6th Job Skill Changes

    • NEW Endgame
      • With a single strike, end a battle by completely unleashing all of Maha’s power.
    • HEXA Beyond Blade
      • The damage of 1st, 2nd, and 3rd hit at master level has been increased from 525% to 675%.
      • The additional hit damage at master level has been increased from 600% to 630%.
      • The feature that decreased the cooldown of the additional attack while Adrenaline Rush was active has been removed.
      • The feature that increased Normal Enemy Damage has been removed.
      • The skill effect has been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • HEXA Finisher - Hunter’s Prey
      • Create a single powerful attack by collecting power in a polearm.
    • Fenrir Crash Boost
      • The skill has been removed.
      • Changed to Final Beyond Blade - White Tiger.
    • Maha’s Fury Boost
      • The skill has been removed.
      • Changed to Finisher - Adrenaline Surge Boost.

    Node Changes

    • Boost Nodes that previously contained the Smash Wave, Rolling Spin, or Gathering Hook skills will now be replaced with the following skills:
      • 1st priority: Beyond Blade
      • 2nd priority: Hyper Finisher - Last Stand
      • 3rd priority: Finisher - Hunter’s Prey
      • Note: Nodes that already include the replaced skill will be updated with a comparable skill.
    • The following Nodes have been removed:
      • Smash Wave
      • Rolling Spin
      • Gathering Hook Node

    Quest Changes

    • A new Aran story has been added.
    • Aran’s quest content has been updated.
    • Previous Aran quests have been removed and can no longer be completed.
    • The completion requirement for the ‘Complete Aran Story Quest’ Legion Artifact Special Mission has been changed from ‘Complete [Neinheart’s Thanks]’ to ‘Complete [Commander of the Past]’.
    • The requirements for the ‘Aran’s Journal’ Achievement has been changed.
    • The following maps have been adjusted to fit the recommended resolution:
      • Lilin’s Home
      • Rein Library 1st, 2nd, and 3rd Floor
      • Mirror Cave
    • Aran players who haven’t completed their 1st Job Advancement before the redux can now advance through the ‘Lilin’s Guidance’ quest.

    Back to Top

    Shade Redux

    Shade's union with the spirits has reached a new level, with brand new ways for the pirate hero to call upon his allies! Shade has new secondary weapons, a new story to enjoy, and a whole lot more!

    Common

    • The classification label for Secondary Weapons has been changed.
    • The equipment level restriction for Blue Fox Marble has been changed to Lv. 10.
    • A new Shade story has been added.
    • Shade’s quest content has been updated.
    • Previous Shade quests have been removed and can no longer be completed.
    • The following Shade items have been added and changed:
      • Medal: Stranger
      • Medal: Beyond Memory
      • Medal: Fox’s Best Friend
      • Medal: Honorary Fox
        • The equipment level restriction has been changed from Lv. 27 to Lv. 30.
      • Equipment: Blue Fox Marble
        • The equipment level restriction has been changed from Lv. 20 to Lv. 10.
    • The Miscellaneous item, Glass Bottle, will no longer be dropped.
    • The completion requirement for the ‘Complete Shade Story Quest’ Legion Artifact Special Mission has been changed from ‘Complete [Mutual Longing]’ to ‘Complete [Gift of the Fox God]’.
    • The requirements for ‘Shade’s Journal’ has been updated.

    Beginner Skill Changes

    • NEW Yearning Heart
      • A new skill that summons spirit guardians with the blessing of the Fox God.
    • Fox Trot
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The skill effects have been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Spirit Bond 1
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Spirit Affinity
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Close Call
      • The skill effect has been changed.

    1st Job Skill Changes

    • NEW Fox God’s Favor
      • A new skill that increases Attack Speed for a set duration, granted by the blessing of the Fox God.
    • Swift Strike
      • The master level has been decreased from 25 to 20.
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The skill effect has been changed.
    • Flash Fist
      • The master level has been decreased from 25 to 20.
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The skill effect has been changed.
    • Vulpes Leap
      • The master level has been decreased from 20 to 10.
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The skill effect has been changed.

    2nd Job Skill Changes

    • NEW Foxy Courage
      • A new skill that boosts your battle prowess by channeling the power of the Fox God.
    • NEW Blade Imp - Direction
      • A new skill that lets the player choose the direction of Blade Imp by summoning a blade spirit.
    • NEW Blade Imp - Spin Slash
      • A new skill that pulls nearby enemies toward you by summoning a blade spirit.
    • Blade Imp - Forward Slash
      • The skill is now usable while in the air.
      • The master level has been increased from 10 to 20.
      • The duration of Blade Imp - Trap has been increased from 60 seconds to 120 seconds.
      • The damage at master level has been increased from 110% to 155%.
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The skill effects have been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Blade Imp - Downward Slash
      • The skill is now usable while in the air.
      • The duration of Blade Imp - Trap has been increased from 60 seconds to 120 seconds.
      • The damage at master level has been increased from 100% to 155%.
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The skill effects have been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
      • Fixed the issue where the hotkey effect did not display when the cooldown reset.
    • Ground Pound
      • The Shockwave feature has been removed.
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The skill effects have been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Fox Spirits
      • The master level has been increased from 1 to 10.
      • The damage at master level has been increased from 80% to 120%.
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The skill effects have been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Back Step
      • The master level has been decreased from 15 to 10.
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The skill effects have been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Spirit Bond 2
      • The Speed at master level has been increased from 20 to 22.
      • A feature that increases maximum Speed has been added.
      • The master level has been decreased from 10 to 4.
    • Fox Spirit Mastery
      • The skill has been removed.

    3rd Job Skill Changes

    • NEW Total Unity
      • A new skill that increases ATT, DEF, and Critical Damage by uniting with the spirit.
    • Shockwave Punch
      • The damage of 1st hit at master level has been increased from 310% to 350%.
      • The attack count of the 1st hit has been increased from 3 times to 4 times.
      • The damage of 2nd hit at master level has been increased from 330% to 396%.
      • The attack count of 2nd hit at master level has been increased from 3 times to 4 times.
      • The feature that triggers a Shockwave has been removed.
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The skill effects have been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Spirit Frenzy
      • Changed to a skill that creates veils, opening a pathway for spirits to walk through.
    • Spirit Trap
      • The cooldown has been decreased from 210 seconds to 120 seconds.
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The skill effects have been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Spirit Redemption
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The skill effects have been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Spirit Bond 3
      • A feature that increases Final Damage and Boss Damage has been added.
      • The feature that increases Damage and ATT has been removed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Weaken
      • The duration of the weakening spirit possession has been increased from 15 seconds to 30 seconds.
      • A feature that increases Ignore Defense has been added.
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Blade Imp - Spin Slash
      • The skill has been removed.

    4th Job Skill Changes

    • NEW Heartfelt Communion
      • A new skill that increases the impact of Fox Spirits and Spirit Frenzy by calling upon more powerful spirits.
    • Bomb Punch
      • The damage of 1st, 2nd, and 3rd hit at master level has been decreased from 300% to 225%.
      • The attack count of the 1st, 2nd, and 3rd hit has been increased from 3 times to 4 times.
      • The Normal Enemy Damage at master level has been decreased from 255%p to 192%.
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The skill effects have been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Spirit Claw
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The skill effects have been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Death Mark
      • The damage at master level has been decreased from 700% to 600%.
      • The attack count has been increased from 3 times to 8 times.
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The skill effects have been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Soul Splitter
      • A skill that creates a soul-burning flame by splitting the enemy’s soul with a flame spirit.
      • While under the Fire Spirit’s Blessing, the Final Damage increase for party members has been reduced to 15% when attacking an enemy with Soul Splitter debuff.
      • The cooldown at master level has been reduced from 180 seconds to 60 seconds.
        • Party members affected by Soul Splitter cannot receive the same effect for a set duration.
      • The Soul Splitter resistance time has been decreased from 90 seconds to 50 seconds.
      • A resistance icon now displays at the bottom of the HP bar when an enemy is resisting Soul Splitter.
      • A resistance debuff effect has been added to show when an enemy is resisting Soul Splitter.
      • This skill is no longer affected by cooldown reset effects.
    • Spirit Ward
      • This skill no longer consumes a guardian spirit upon colliding with an enemy.
      • A feature that re-casts Spirit Ward at set intervals when the guardian spirit isn’t maxed out has been added.
    • Critical Insight
      • The Critical Rate at master level has been decreased from 25% to 10%.
      • The Critical Damage at master level has been increased from 10% to 18%.
    • Spirit Bond 4
      • The Final Damage increase has been removed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Advanced Knuckle Mastery
      • The Critical Damage increase has been removed.
    • Fire Fox Spirit Mastery
      • The skill has been removed.

    Hyper Skill Changes

    • NEW Fox Marble Fusion
      • A new skill that unleashes the power of the Fox God from the Fox Marble has been added.
      • The Fox Spirits Orb damage at master level has been increased from 110% to 140%.
    • Fire Fox Spirits - Reinforce
      • The skill name has been changed to Fox Spirits - Reinforce
    • Fire Fox Spirits - Repeated Attack Bonus
      • The skill name has been changed to Fox Spirits - Repeated Attack Bonus.
    • Fire Fox Spirits - Summon Chance
      • The skill name has been changed to Fox Spirits - Summon Chance.
    • Spirit Incarnation
      • A feature that decreases the cooldown based on the remaining key down time at the end of the skill has been added.
      • The damage has been decreased from 700% to 100%.
      • The attack count has been increased from 1 times to 7 times.
    • Heroic Memories
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The skill effect has been changed.
    • Spirit Bond Max
      • The skill has been removed.

    5th Job Skill Changes

    • NEW Fox God Flash
      • A new skill that releases a bright light cutting through darkness by manifesting as an avatar of the Fox God has been added.
      • The skill can be used while in the air.
    • Spiritgate
      • Changed to a skill that opens the spirit gate, allowing dark spirits to attack the enemy with a powerful release of energy.
    • True Spirit Claw
      • The damage at Lv. 25 has been increased from 690% to 800%.
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The skill effect has been changed.
    • Smashing Multipunch
      • The max key down time has been increased from 1.3 seconds to 1.8 seconds.
      • The attack count has been increased from 5 to 10.
      • The final attack activation count has been increased from 3 times to 8 times.
      • The Fox Spirit creation chance upon landing an attack has been decreased from 100% to 50%.
      • The feature that summons additional Fox Spirits upon landing the final attack has been removed.
      • The damage at Lv. 25 has been decreased from 500% to 410%.
      • The Shockwave damage at Lv. 25 has been increased from 700% to 800%.
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The skill effects have been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Spirit Flow
      • The skill has been removed.

    6th Job Skill Changes

    • NEW HEXA Fox Spirits
      • A new skill that enhances Fox Spirits.
      • The damage at master level has been increased from 235% to 352%.
      • The damage increase of Fox Marble Fusion at master level has been increased from 85% to 93%.
    • NEW Advent of the Fox
      • A new skill that awakens all of Shade's dormant spiritual power through the resonance with the Fox God.
    • NEW HEXA Spirit Claw
      • A new skill that summons a wind spirit to claw at multiple enemies.
    • Spirit Flow Boost
      • The skill name has been changed to Fox God Flash Boost.
    • HEXA Spirit Frenzy
      • The skill has been removed.

    Node Changes

    • Boost Nodes that previously contained the Blade Imp - Downward Slash or Blade Imp - Spin Slash skill will now be replaced with the following skills:
      • 1st priority: Blade Imp
      • 2nd priority: Spirit Claw
      • 3rd priority: Fox Spirits
      • Note: Nodes that already include the replaced skill will be updated with a comparable skill.
    • Blade Imp - Forward Slash
      • The Node name has been changed to Blade Imp Node.
    • The following Nodes have been removed:
      • Blade Imp - Downward Slash
      • Blade Imp - Spin Slash Node

    Back to Top

    Skill Improvements and Bug Fixes

    Shade and Aran aren't the only ones being improved with The Dark Ride update. Look over the truly massive list of changes, improvements, and fixes for all of MapleStory's classes below!

    Common Improvements and Bug Fixes

    • Detailed stats will now display when hovering the mouse cursor over the gauge UI for the following jobs:
      • Luminous
      • Kaiser
      • Ark
    • Changed the cooldown for Hero’s Echo, Exclusive Spell, and Focused Time to 300 seconds.
    • Changed the Holy Fountain buff icon activated by Unreliable Memory to differentiate it from Bishop’s Holy Fountain buff icon.
    • Changed the following skills acquired through Nodestones to be a passive effect:
      • Decent Speed Infusion
      • Decent Advanced Blessing
    • Changed the following stat increase effects skills to be a passive effect:
      • Maple Warrior
      • Call of Cygnus
      • Rhinne’s Protection
      • President’s Orders
      • Nova Warrior
      • Hero of the Flora
      • Anima Warrior
      • Akatsuki Warrior
    • Removed the preparation time for Goddess’s Blessing and a cooldown has been added for the following skills:
      • Maple World Goddess’s Blessing
      • Empress Cygnus’s Blessing
      • Transcendent Cygnus’s Blessing
      • Transcendent Rhinne’s Prayer
      • Grandis Goddess’s Blessing
      • Otherworld Goddess’s Blessing
      • Princess Sakuno’s Blessing
    • Decent Advanced Blessing
      • Added a feature that permanently increases all stats.
    • Empress Cygnus’s Blessing
      • Fixed the issue where the damage increase from Cygnus Blessing exceeded the maximum damage.
    • Otherworld Goddess’s Blessing
      • When the blessing is active, the Otherworldly Void attack will trigger at least 3 times during its duration.
    • Transcendent Rhinne’s Prayer
      • Fixed the issue where the duration of the Immune Barrier was not set to the maximum duration upon activation.
    • Conversion Overdrive
      • Removed the preparation time.
    • Divine Wrath
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Added the ability to toggle the effect on/off for the following skills:
      • Mana Overload
      • Bleed Dart
      • Blood Money
      • Blade Clone
      • Equinox Cycle
      • Dark Metamorphosis - Enhance
      • Blue Blood
    • Weapon Aura
      • The attack range has been changed to increase vertically.
    • Last Resort
      • The damage taken increase at Lv. 25 has been decreased from 40% to 30%.
      • The final damage increase at Lv. 25 has been decreased from 35% to 29%.
    • Decent Mystic Door
      • Magic Rock will no longer be consumed when cast.
    • Decent Holy Fountain
      • A new Node that summons a holy fountain to restore party members HP with holy power.
    • Venom Burst
      • Fixed the issue where the original DoT damage spread to monsters that could not be hit.
    • Fixed the issue of delayed changes when adjusting settings for skills with special modes or locked commands.
    • Fixed the issue where the “You cannot use that skill yet” pop-up would appear when trying to use the Noblesse Skill again without having mesos.
    • Fixed the issue where the Goddess of the Other World’s Blessing’s Otherworldly Void was sometimes activated abnormally.
    • Fixed the issue where the icon looked awkward when hovering the mouse over the Butterfly Garden Light Lv.3 Skill in the Lil Glowy Butterfly Set.
    • Fixed the issue where the direction sometimes would not change when casting Erda Spectrum: Erda Release.
    • Fixed the issue where the cooldown reduction effect of the following Special Nodes was applied to certain Hyper Skills:
      • Come Back I
      • Come Back II
      • Relentless Attack
      • Withstand II
    • Fixed the issue where Sol Janus was affected by the cooldown reset effect.
    • Fixed the issue where the following skills appeared in awkward locations:
    Job Skill Image
    Bishop Holy Advent
    Kaiser Nova Guardians
    Bladefall
    Kain Lasting Grudge
    • Fixed the awkward display of the effect in the zoomed-out map when the following skills were used:
    Job Skill Image
    Bishop Holy Advent
    Pathfinder Forsaken Relic
    Demon Slayer Nightmare
    • Fixed the issue where Sol Janus: Dawn activated when the following skills were used:
    Job Skill Image
    Bowman (all) Guided Arrow
    Paladin Hammers of the Righteous
    Arch Mage (Fire, Poison) Ignite
    Dark Knight Darkness Aura

    Job Skill Improvements and Bug Fixes

    • Angelic Buster
      • Mighty Mascot
        • Fixed the issue where the explosion damage of Mighty Mascot was not enhanced by the HEXA Boost Node.
        • The damage over time at Lv. 30 has been decreased from 1540% to 1265%.
        • The explosion damage at Lv. 30 has been decreased from 1815% to 1485%.
    • Xenon
      • Hero’s Echo
        • Fixed the issue where MP was not consumed when using Hero’s Echo.
    • Demon Avenger
      • Requiem
        • Fixed the issue where the use duration was not displayed.
      • Demon Sword Roar
        • Fixed the issue where the activation duration was not displayed.
    • Hero
      • Upward Charge
        • The action delay has been reduced by approximately 35%.
      • Warrior Mastery
        • The speed increase at master level has been increased from 10 to 22.
        • The maximum speed has been increased from 10 to 20.
      • Rising Rage
        • The damage at master level has been increased from 500% to 560%.
      • Cry Valhalla
        • The damage at master level has been increased from 370% to 520%.
        • The action delay has decreased by approximately 13%.
      • Burning Soul Blade
        • The action delay has decreased by approximately 7%.
      • Instinctual Combo
        • The Tear in Space damage at Lv. 25 has been increased from 325% to 365%.
      • Sword Illusion
        • The action delay has decreased by approximately 10%.
      • HEXA Rising Rage
        • The damage at master level has been increased by 254% to 270%.
    • Paladin

      • White Heat Rush
        • A feature that allows you to jump by using the attack key when not riding a jaguar has been added
        • When using a custom command, you can jump by using only the skill key without pressing the attack key, even when not riding a Jaguar.
      • Feline Berserk
        • A feature that permanently increases maximum speed has been added.
      • Drill Salvo
        • The duration has been increased from 30 seconds to 60 seconds.
      • Jaguar Storm
        • A feature that allows you to summon three more powerful Jaguars using a custom command without needing to input directional keys has been added.
      • Primal Fury
        • If used while not riding a Jaguar, you will not be able to cancel the skill casting effect of Wild Vulcan Type X.
      • Hunting Assistant Unit
        • The skill icon has been changed.
      • Wild Lure
        • The skill description has been changed.
      • Fixed the issue where the character looked awkward while climbing a ladder and mounted on a Jaguar.
    • Mechanic
      • Rocket Booster
        • A feature that permanently increases movement speed has been added.
      • Jet Booster
        • Fixed the issue where the Tank effect was displayed awkwardly when Jet Booster was used while in Tank Mech state.
      • Overclock
        • The final damage at master level has been increased from 39% to 42%.
      • Giant Robot SG-88
        • The skill is now usable while in the air.
      • Support Unit: H-EX
        • A buff icon will be displayed when summoned.
        • The skill icons will not disappear when out of range.
        • The skill description has been changed.
      • Support Unit: H-EX - Party Reinforce
        • The final damage for party members has been decreased from 4% to 2%.
      • Full Metal Barrage
        • The maximum keydown duration has been reduced from 10 seconds to 8 seconds.
        • The attack count has been increased from 11 times to 12 times.
        • The attack interval has been decreased by approximately 16%.
        • Fixed the issue where the client would sometimes crash upon using the skill.
      • Fixed the issue of the sound effect not playing during a basic attack while not riding a Mech.
      • Fixed the issue of the sound effect not playing during a basic attack while riding a Humanoid Mech.
    • Demon Slayer
      • Shadow Swiftness
        • A feature that increases maximum speed has been added.
      • Demon Impact
        • The action delay has decreased by approximately 11%.
      • Demon Cry
        • The feature that reduced cooldown while Boundless Rage is active has been removed.
        • The cooldown has been decreased from 14 seconds to 6 seconds.
      • HEXA Demon Impact
        • The action delay has decreased by approximately 11%.
        • The action delay of Demon Chain has decreased by approximately 11%.
    • Demon Avenger
      • NEW Surpass Limit
        • A new skill that allows you to overcome limitations, preventing HP from being consumed when using skills for a certain period of time.
      • Overwhelming Power
        • The master level has been decreased from 30 to 25.
      • Forbidden Contract
        • The feature that prevented HP consumption when using skills while active has been removed.
      • Dimensional Sword
        • The damage at Lv. 25 has been increased from 1850% to 2350%.
        • The attack count has been increased from 14 times to 15 times.
        • The damage of the magical sword's rotation at Lv. 25 has been increased from 900% to 1000%.
        • The attack count of the magical sword's rotation has been increased from 8 to 10.
      • Revenant
        • 50% of the current HP is consumed upon use.
        • The damage at Lv. 25 has been increased from 900% to 1200%.
      • HEXA Nether Shield
        • The feature that decreases final damage when repeatedly hit will now apply only to boss monsters.
    • Xenon
      • Propulsion Burst
        • The ability to jump upwards has been added.
        • Upon using the skill, Quicksilver: Takeoff and Diagonal Chase can only be used once.
      • Quicksilver: Takeoff
        • Upon using the skill, Propulsion Burst cannot be used in an upward direction.
      • Combat Switch: Fission
        • Upon using the skill, Propulsion Burst cannot be used in an upward direction.
      • Temporal Pod
        • Fixed the issue where the cooldown reduction effect applied to some Hyper Skills.
      • Core Overload
        • The maximum duration is 70 seconds.
      • Hypogram Field: Force Field
        • Fixed the issue where damage appeared awkwardly to other players.
        • Fixed the issue where the number of uses was not calculated correctly during a battle analysis.
      • HEXA Hypogram Field: Froce Field
        • Fixed the issue where damage appeared awkwardly to other players.
        • Fixed the issue where the number of uses was not calculated correctly during a battle analysis.
    • Kaiser
      • Transfiguration
        • The increased ability value is applied at a fixed rate and does not change based on the amount of morph gauge. The knockback resistance increase is applied only when in a state other than the final form.
      • Cursebite
        • The skill description has been changed.
    • Kain
      • Annihilation
        • The skill description has been changed.
      • Dragon Fang
        • The damage at master level has been increased from 100% to 110%.
      • Lasting Grudge
        • The damage at master level has been increased from 110% to 130%.
      • Dogma
        • The final damage at master level has been increased from 20% to 25%.
      • [Possess] Dragon Burst
        • The feature that fixed movement speed while holding down the key has been removed.
        • The damage at Lv. 25 has been increased from 885% to 1125%.
      • [Execute] Fatal Blitz
        • The damage at Lv. 25 has been increased from 665% to 750%.
    • Cadena
      • Keen Eye
        • A feature that permanently increases damage has been added.
      • Weapons Expert
        • The attack power at master level has been increased from 30 to 50.
        • The critical damage at master level has been increased from 16% to 19%.
      • Wisdom of Shadows II
        • A feature that permanently increases damage when attacking boss monsters has been added.
      • Chain Arts: Void Strike
        • The damage at Lv. 25 has been increased from 500% to 700%.
      • Muscle Memory Finale
        • The damage at Lv. 25 has been increased from 500% to 600%.
    • Zero
      • Time Distortion
        • Fixed the issue where the attack speed increase status would sometimes be longer than 4 seconds.
      • Burst Jump
        • The skill can now be used to jump upwards.
      • Burst Step
        • A feature that prevents the use of Burst Step in the upward direction after using Burst Jump upward has been added.
        • A feature has been added that prevents the use of Burst Jump in the upward direction again after it has already been used upward.
      • End Time
        • A feature that allows Doubletime’s Recon and Strength stack to the maximum count when casting a skill has been added.
    • Kinesis
      • Psychic Tornado
        • Fixed the issue where the buff icon remained visible after the skill ended when moving to a different map.
      • Afterimage of the Otherworld
        • A feature that increases critical damage has been added.
        • The boost in all abilities through direct investment of AP at Lv. 25 has been increased from 15% to 455.
      • Psychic Tornado
        • The attack count has been increased from 4 times to 8 times.
        • The attack count when thrown object moves has been increased from 2 times to 4 times.
        • The attack count upon explosion has been increased from 3 times to 6 times.
        • Objects will now be thrown forward at the end of the skill while casting From Another Realm.
      • Ultimate - Mind Over Matter
        • A feature that stops materials when hitting a boss monster has been added.
        • The cooldown has been decreased from 90 seconds to 60 seconds.
        • The duration has been decreased from 30 seconds to 15 seconds.
        • The damage upon contact at Lv.25 has been increased from 1000% to 1350%.
        • The damage upon extinction at Lv. 25 has been decreased from 1400% to 950%.
    • Adele
      • Noble Summons
        • Fixed the issue where the Ignore Defense increase debuff effect would sometimes look awkward.
      • Magic Dispatch
        • The skill is now usable while in the air.
      • Ruin
        • The skill is now usable while in the air.
      • Shardbreaker
        • The skill is now usable while in the air.
        • A feature that creates fragments for enemies that have the Death Mark applied has been added.
        • The number of fragments created for enemies with the Death Mark applied is reduced by half.
        • The damage for enemies with the Death Mark applied for creating and destroying fragments at master level is 2500%.
      • Martial Discipline
        • A feature that permanently increases maximum speed has been added.
        • The movement speed at master level has been increased from 10 to 17.
      • Aether Forge
        • Fixed the issue where the disappearance effect would sometimes display awkwardly.
      • Resonance Rush
        • The action delay has been decreased by approximately 10%.
        • The ability to stack buffs has been removed.
        • The final damage has been increased from 5% to 10%.
        • The ignore monster DEF has been increased from 5% to 10%.
      • Ascent
        • The final damage at master level has been increased from 16% to 17%.
      • Grave Proclamation
        • The feature that increased damage against enemies with a Death Mark has been removed.
      • Bladecaster Expertise
        • A feature that permanently increases damage has been added.
      • Strive
        • The feature that increased boss damage has been removed.
        • A feature that permanently increases damage has been added.
      • Blade Torrent
        • The skill description has been changed.
      • Magic Conversion
        • The skill description has been changed
    • Illium
      • Magic Conversion
        • The skill description has been changed.
      • Crystalline Wings
        • The ability to jump upwards has been added.
        • You can no longer jump upwards after flying in the air.
      • Crystal Skill - Wings of Glory
        • Fixed the issue where mytocrystals would summon and the gauge would sometimes fill when the Crystal Skill - Wings of Glory is activated.
      • Winged Javelin
        • Fixed the issue where the skill looked awkward.
      • The duration has been increased from 10 seconds to 20 seconds for the following skills:
        • Lucent Brand
        • Lucent Bran II
        • Lucent Brand III
        • Umbral Brand
        • Umbral Brand II
        • Umbral Brand III
      • Might of the Flora
        • The damage at master level has been increased from 10% to 15%.
        • The speed at master level has been increased from 10 to 22.
        • The max speed at master level has been increased from 10 to 20.
      • Wisdom of the Crystal
        • The final damage at master level has been increased from 40% to 47%.
      • Crystal Skill - Deus
        • The Crystal Charge resets when summoning Deus, and if the charge is 90 or more, you can reuse the skill to resummon Deus.
      • Crystal Gate
        • Crystal Gate can now be summoned over the dragon veins created by Lara’s Manifestation: Where the River Courses.
      • Fixed the issue where mytocrystals were hidden in the background.
      • Fixed the issue where damage was not being applied as intended for the following skills:
        • Vortex Wing
        • HEXA Vortex Wing
    • Khali
      • Hex: Chakram Sweep

        • The feature that increases the Final Damage of the Abyssal Guard based on the duration of holding down the key has been removed.
        • The action delay of Abyssal Guard has been decreased by 29%.

        • Sage: Clone Rampage
